item.title: Fix MacFusion on Snow Leopard
item.description: Running OS X 10.6.3? William Fennie found a fix on Google Groups. First off, credit for this fix on OS X 10.6.2 goes to Geoff Watts from his two tweets. If you’re using Snow Leopard, you’ll find that the current version of MacFusion refuses to complete a connection to a remote server. You can fix this in two steps: First, quit MacFusion. Second, open System Preferences and then open the MacFUSE pane.
